name: UNBOUND (BigBrainGamesLTD)
description:
Play as a dimension shifting spirit in this puzzle platformer. Travel though vast worlds, both dark and light, collecting fragments of a shattered past and solving puzzles.

This game has been built for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021 and is still in early prototype stage, pending future development.

Not representative of final product.

Team Members:
Animation and Sound Design - Connor Byrne 
3D Character/Environment Artist - Chrystian Adach
Designer/Level Designer/ Programmer/ Team Lead - Luke Weston

Game controls keyboard:
'jump' - SPACE
'move' - W, A, S, D, 
'soul-shift' - E
'interact' - F

Game controls xbox or xbox style gamepad:
'jump' - A
'move' - left stick
'soul-shift' - Y
'interact' - X

Game has only been tested with official xbox controller, generic xbox style controller and DS4 controller with use of DS4 software
